document_data.name: Orauzalar
document_data.mainbody: '''Orauzalar''' was a famous [[wizard]] and scholar of the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], who from the nation of [[Impiltur]] . He was considered the foremost authority on [[History of Impiltur|Impilutur's]] long and storied history.{{Cite dragon/346/Impiltur: The Forgotten Kingdom}}
document_data.Activities:
While [[Red Wizard]] activities were tolerated throughout the realm by [[Sambryl|Queen-regent Sambryl]] and the [[Lords of Imphras II]], they were secretly opposed by Orauzalar. 

He openly criticized the council as they allowed the formation of [[Thay]]an [[Thayan enclave|enclave]]s in the cities of [[Dilpur]], [[Ilmwatch]] and [[Lyrabar]]. He believed that the council acquiesced to the demands of the cities' merchants and filled their own personal coffers in the process.
